overview: Danica Dillon, Sammie Daniels & Tysen Rich: This is how you please a boy. Now let me show you how to please a girl. Eva Karera and Jasmine Gomez: He so wants his girlfriend's step-mom! Ariella Ferrera and Mila Jade: She asks step-mom for sex tips & gets a hands-on lesson! Audrey Show and Marry Lynn: Step-mom turns exercise session into a fuck party!
title: Moms Teach Sex 6
